duties_responsibilities.duty: Define and lead upstream packaging strategies and integrate with commodity risk management plans.
Establish Direct Procurement linkage to Packaging, Technology and CIC, with clear understanding and active participation in innovation strategies and projects.
Drive compliance to short and long term goals in transparency and sustainability.
Create the Risk Landscape Mgmt Plan, including volatility risk and supply disruptions risk.
Develop best practices to report, capture and mitigate price risk both financially and within physical contracts.
Lead the volatility risk management programs which include financial hedging, price locking and improving forward costs transparency.
Define packaging strategic suppliers and develop a plan bringing innovation, sustainability and operational excellence.
Lead continuous improvement programs with suppliers.
Identify cost saving opportunities and execute effective negotiations with global suppliers.
Participates in external industry forums and seminars on an as needed basis.
Execute annual direct materials budget guidance and support.
Work with Legal to develop & negotiate confidentiality agreements, contracts and commercial agreements.
